Fantasy Football Assistant

DashboardSettings

Fantasy Football Assistant

How to Find Your IDs:

League ID:

1. Go to your ESPN Fantasy Football league

2. Look at the URL: fantasy.espn.com/football/league?leagueId=123456

3. Copy the number after leagueId=

Team ID:

1. Go to your team page in ESPN

2. Look at the URL: fantasy.espn.com/football/team?leagueId=123456&teamId=1

3. Copy the number after teamId=
